name: Statspring.GitHub.io
body:
### ## # ### Welcome To SiteSpring Reducing Cost Improving Service and Sharing Intelligence.

# More Metrics
# More Opportunities
# More Independence.

### ## # The service is new and for the time being, totally free.

Get started here:
```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

Serving is faster and cheaper than ever before and we all love digital ocean, but for many purposes Wordpress and database driven apps and resources are just overkill and slowing down the web, and static site generators are still lets face it awfully geeky and technical for non techie types who can't spell markdown. There's a faster better cheaper distributed way we can change this. And we're going to let you try it very soon. 

If net neutrality didnt get a last minute phone call from the governor so to speak, we'd be in it right about now. Or would we? We've pondered that fear with some smart people who agree we can take the web more into the hands of the individual the end user.. 
 
In developing our solutions we have been looking at alternative outlets and communications models, and truly its amazing how much is undone despite the webs frantic mission to be better faster safer and more accessible. 

[ ] Containerization
[ ] Virtualization
[ ] Ephemeral Data Life
[ ] Client Side Processing
[ ] Enhanced Metrics

###Faster Than you Think
These are the technologies that we are using to do more with less. To speed up while slowing down. They have the power to safeguard, and enrich our lives, while tripling our productivity. They may even have the power to extend our lives, indefinitely. 

### Designing a New World
We're doing our small part to begin bringing some of these technologies into our daily lives, but first we want to make sure the right foundation is laid. and that means. Safeguarding our privacy, limiting our dependence on falsely inflated commodities like oil, and an economy based on theoretical value as determined by confidence levels amongst a majority who is constantly being manipulated. Many things will have to change open source is good but the individual cannot be forgotten in the shadow of the collective. We need to find the golden triangle to bring balance symbiotic harmony amongst the many the few and the individual.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
